name: Chapteh Champion (Game Jam)
description:
THE WAY OF THE CHAPTEH IS A TOUGH AND UNFORGIVING ONE

Thank you so much for checking out my little game.

Chapteh Champion is very much based on my childhood experience of playing chapteh in primary/secondary school. That's the reason why I made sure to include details like using a bottle to mark the boundaries of the "court", and the ability to perform an over-the-head kick.

The game is incomplete, unbalanced, and the AI is janky, but I intend to improve upon this and perhaps expand upon the idea! If you have any feedback/ideas, feel free to drop me a note via Twitter @chinykian, or through my discord server: https://discord.gg/exGJZ7C

THANKS!!

(Mac build isn't working. I'm looking into it at the moment.)
